    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet PersonName_Detail

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:PersonName_Summary
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:PersonName_Detail

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<PersonNameDetail defaultInd="true" language="en" type="Alternate" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Prefix>Mr.</Prefix>
    <Given>John</Given>
    <Middle>Example String Value</Middle>
    <Surname>Smith</Surname>
    <SurnamePrefix>Example String Value</SurnamePrefix>
    <Suffix>Example String Value</Suffix>
    <Title>Example String Value</Title>
    <PersonDocument>
        <DocType>NaturalizationCertificate</DocType>
    </PersonDocument>
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
</PersonNameDetail>

      Example JSON

      {
  "PersonNameDetail" : {
    "type" : "Alternate",
    "language" : "en",
    "defaultInd" : true,
    "Prefix" : [ "Mr." ],
    "Given" : [ "John" ],
    "Middle" : [ "Example String Value" ],
    "Surname" : "Smith",
    "SurnamePrefix" : "Example String Value",
    "Suffix" : [ "Example String Value" ],
    "Title" : [ "Example String Value" ],
    "PersonDocument" : {
      "@type" : "PersonDocument",
      "DocType" : {
        "value" : "NaturalizationCertificate"
      }
    },
    "Privacy" : {
      "value" : null,
      "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
      "shareSyncInd" : "No",
      "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
      "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
      "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        SurnamePrefix
        The surname prefix, e.g "van der", "von", "de".
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Suffix
        Hold various name suffixes and letters (e.g. Jr., Sr., III, Ret., Esq.)
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 3
        Title
        Degree or honors (e.g., Ph.D., M.D.)
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 3
        PersonDocument
        Document information for verification purposes and also used for additional filtering for common names.
        Details
        Type PersonDocument
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Privacy
        Allows for control of the sharing of access data between parties.
        Details
        Type Privacy
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Properties inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:PersonName_Summary

        Prefix, Given, Middle, Surname

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        type
        Type of name of the individual, such as former, nickname, alternate or alias name. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Name Type (NAM).
        Details
        Type NameType
        Example Value Alternate
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        language
        The language the name is represented in, e.g. an Eastern name versus a Western name.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:language
        Example Value en
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        defaultInd
        If true, this is the default or primary name within a collection of names.
